dcterms:creator: Yonatan Vaizman
Nadir Weibel
Gert Lanckriet
dcterms:description: The UCSD ExtraSensory dataset contains data from 60 users collected through personal smartphones, including high-frequency motion reactive sensor data such as accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer. The dataset has inherent missingness of 66% for each sensor, and the data collection app performs a 20-second recording session automatically every minute.
dcterms:title: UCSD ExtraSensory dataset
